item.title: Python
item.description: Getting Started Introduction Python (python.org) Learn X in Y minutes (learnxinyminutes.com) Regex in python (quickref.me) Hello World 1 2 >>> print("Hello, World!") Hello, World! The famous “Hello World” program in Python Variables 1 2 3 age = 18 # age is of type int name = "John" # name is now of type str print(name) Python can’t declare a variable without assignment.
